title: Technical issues
body: When i go to the champion select to pick a champion, the screen turns black.

replies.body: The black screen suggests a network problem failing to establish a connection to the game server.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
